Class CommandWords

java.lang.Object
  CommandWords

public class CommandWords
extends Object

This class is part of the "Eternal Destiny" application. "Eternal Destiny" is a text based adventure game. This class holds an enumeration of all command words known to the game. It is used to recognize commands as they are typed in.

Version:
2013.01.22
Author:
Maria Jump, Andrea Siejna

Constructor Summary

          Constructor - initialize the command words in the HashMap.

Method Detail

getCommand

public CommandEnum getCommand(String aString)
Convert a string into a CommandEnum object.

Parameters:
aString - The string containing the command word.
Returns:
The CommandEnum object representing the command.

getCommandString

public String getCommandString()
Return a list of the available commands, of the form: Your command words are: look go quit help

Returns:
A string containing the list of available commands.

isCommand

public boolean isCommand(String aString)
Check whether a given String is a valid command word.

Parameters:
aString - The string to determine whether it is a valid command.
Returns:
true if a given string is a valid command, false if it isn't.
